Blood Elf

Darkvision
Blind Fight
Epic Prowess
Cleave

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
I was thinking 5 fighter for WS 19 Barbarian for HPs 16 Black Guard for special summon

Thoughts??

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Ignore BG altogether.  Adds nothing worthwhile.

PAL 14/CoT 6  pre-epic, PAL 25/CoT 10/HS 5 final  (based a great deal on Cin's Harper Champ of 2005 but with indispellable pally buffs)

STR 18 (26), DEX 8, CON 14, WIS 12 (14), INT 14, CHA 17 (26)

Feats, pre-epic: WP Exotic, WF, PA, DivS, Alertness, Ironwill, ImpCrit, KD/IKD, DivM
Feats, epic: EWF, Grt WIS x2, Grt STR x3, Grt CHA x3, Armorskin, Extra Smite
Feats, free, racial:  BF, Prowess, Cleave

Skills: all prereqs for HS, Tumble 40, max Disc, max Taunt, balance into Listen

Even unbuffed, saves and combat potential is impressive and smites equally so.  Loads of divine damage to penetrate DR.

Then go with your idea but change Ftr to CoT and go Brb 16/BG 16/CoT 8 (only need Brb 15 for TR).  You'll lose WS/EWS but get no XP penalty and get nice saves. 

BTW, what does a favored class in prestige accomplish?  All favoring is used for is determining classes immune to XP penalty, at least under default rules.
